verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: floated] [ARG1: the idea of holding his planned summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in the Demilitarized Zone that divides the Koreas] .

President Donald Trump on Monday floated the idea of holding his planned summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in [ARG0: the Demilitarized Zone] [R-ARG0: that] [V: divides] [ARG1: the Koreas] .
